name: Color: Rose Quartz - soft shimmering pink
ONLY A FEW LEFT

ingredients:
Clean at Sephora products are formulated without the following banned or restricted ingredients (please see Clean at Sephora landing page for full list of specific restrictions and allowances by category – this is not an exhaustive list):

-Cauliflower Mushroom: Rich in veratric acid for skin protection and hydration.-Aloe: Promotes hydration and includes calming and antioxidant soothing benefits. -Murumuru: Helps support natural skin barrier to prevent moisture loss.Aloe Barbadensis Leaf Juice*, Water/Aqua/Eau, Decyl Glucoside, Glycerin^, Coco-Glucoside, Xanthan Gum, Sodium Cocoyl Glutamate, Glyceryl Oleate, Saccharide Isomerate, Potassium Sorbate, Sodium Levulinate, Helianthus Annuus (Sunflower) Seed Oil*, Sodium Astrocaryum Murumuruate, Carrageenan, Citric Acid, Pelargonium Graveolens Flower Oil, Morinda Citrifolia Fruit Extract*, Glucose, Sodium Phytate, Sparassis Crispa Extract, Ocimum Basillicum (Basil) Oil, Rosa Centifolia Flower Oil, Sodium Citrate, Alcohol, Sodium Gluconate, Tocopherol, Hydrogenated Palm Glycerides Citrate, Citronellol**, Geraniol**. *Ingredients from Organic Farming. **From Essential Oils. ^Made with organic ingredients.99.6% natural origin of total. 71.2% of the total ingredients are from organic farming. 81.5% organic of total minus water and minerals. product_name: Noni Night AHA Pore & Resurfacing Serum
ingredients:
-Lemon Peel Ferment: Provides a natural source of AHA, visibly refining and balancing the complexion.-Tonka Bean Bio-Ferment: Contains high levels of polyphenols with antioxidant benefits that defy visible signs of aging.-Willow Bark Extract: Gently exfoliates to reveal fresh, visibly glowing skin.Aloe Barbadensis Leaf Juice*, Lactic Acid, Persea Gratissima (Avocado) Oil*, Water/Aqua/Eau, Lactobacillus Ferment, Vitis Vinifera (Grape) Juice Extract, Glycerin, Glyceryl Stearate Citrate, Potassium Hydroxide, Sodium Stearoyl Glutamate, Helianthus Annuus (Sunflower) Seed Oil*, Brassica Alcohol, Lactobacillus/Dipteryx Odorata Seed Ferment Filtrate, Polyglyceryl-3 Stearate, Lactobacillus, Lysolecithin, Sclerotium Gum, Xylityl Sesquicaprylate, Jojoba Esters, Hydrogenated Lecithin, Pullulan, Xanthan Gum, Cocos Nucifera (Coconut) Fruit Extract, Potassium Sorbate, Citrus Aurantium (Neroli) Flower Oil*, Willow Bark Extract, Anhydroxylitol, Microcitrus Australasica Fruit Extract, Tocopherol, Lactobacillus/Lemon Peel Ferment Extract, Morinda Citrifolia Fruit Extract*, Silica, Hydrolyzed Sodium Hyaluronate, Pelargonium Graveolens (Chinese Geranium) Flower Oil, Leuconostoc/Radish Root Ferment Filtrate, Amethyst Powder, Citronellol**, Farnesol**, Geraniol**, Linalool**, Limonene**. *Ingredients from Organic Farming **From essential oils. 99.8% natural origin of total. 70.9% of the total ingredients are from Organic Farming. product_name: Turmeric BHA Pore & Brightening Treatment Mask
ingredients:
-Turmeric: Visibly brightens and evens skin tone, reduces the look of pigmentation, calms redness, and diminishes the visible signs of aging while protecting against environmental stressors. -Papaya Enzymes: Gently exfoliate dead skin cells and diminish the appearance of scars and blemishes.-Aspen Bark: Natural source of BHA that helps clear clogged pores.Aloe Barbadensis (Aloe Vera) Leaf Juice*, Pumice, Glycerin, Rosa Canina (Rose Hip) Seed Powder*, Lactobacillus Ferment, Water/Aqua/Eau, Camellia Sinensis Leaf Powder*, Bambusa Arundinacea Stem Extract, Oryza Sativa (Rice) Extract*, Morinda Citrifolia Fruit Powder*, Lactobacillus, Rosa Canina (Rosehip) Fruit Oil*, Sodium Levulinate, Sclerotium Gum, Populus Tremuloides Bark Extract, Carica Papaya (Papaya) Fruit Extract*, Cetearyl Alcohol , Sodium Anisate, Potassium Sorbate, Curcuma Longa (Turmeric) Root Extract*, Cocos Nucifera (Coconut) Fruit Extract, Sodium Stearoyl Glutamate, Helianthus Annuus (Sunflower) Seed Wax/Helianthus Annuus Seed Cera, Mentha Piperita (Peppermint) Flower/Leaf/Stem Oil*, Lactic Acid, Lavandula Angustifolia (Lavender) Oil, Citrus Limon (Lemon) Peel Oil, (Tapioca) Maltodextrin^, Cetearyl Glucoside, Carrageenan, Sodium Phytate , Cananga Odorata Flower Oil, Juniperus Virginiana (Cedarwood) Oil, Glucose, Leuconostoc Ferment Filtrate, Tocopherol, Soybean Peroxidase, Superoxide Dismutase, Ascorbyl Palmitate, Alcohol, Limonene**, Linalool**.  *Ingredients from Organic Farming.  **From Essential Oils.  ^Made using organic ingredients. 99.7% natural origin of total. 75.1% of the total ingredients are from organic farming. 83.6% organic of total minus water and minerals. COSMOS ORGANIC certified by ECOCERT Greenlife according to COSMOS Standard available at http://COSMOS.ecocert.com WARNING: Product intended for cosmetic use only. If irritation occurs discontinue use. Store below 30°C/86°F. Keep out of reach of children. Avoid contact with eyes. Sunburn Alert: This product contains an alpha hydroxy acid (AHA) that may increase your skin's sensitivity to the sun and particularly the possibility of sunburn. Use a sunscreen, wear protective clothing, and limit sun exposure while using this product and for a week afterwards.
99.7% du total est d’origine naturelle. 75.1% du total des ingrédients sont issus de l’agriculture biologique. 83.6% du produit total moins l’eau et les minéraux est d’origine biologique. applies to products that are meant to be rinsed off ), Resorcinol, Talc (Talc that is free of any asbestos can be used in the formulation provided that Brand conducts testing to ensure that talc is product_name: Berry Bright Firming Vitamin C Refillable Eye Cream
ingredients: -Kangaroo Paw Flower: Visibly minimizes fine lines and wrinkles around eyes.-Kakadu Plum: Is known to be the world’s richest natural source of vitamin C. -Cloudberry: Visibly brightens and energizes dull skin with high levels of vitamins C and E.Aloe Barbadensis (Aloe Vera) Leaf Juice*, Rosa Canina (Rosehip) Seed Oil*, Glycerin, Balanites Roxburghii Seed Oil*, Cetearyl Alcohol, Water/Aqua/Eau, Coconut Alkanes, Lactobacillus Ferment, Oleic/Linoleic/Linolenic Polyglycerides, Cetearyl Olivate, Sorbitan Olivate, Propanediol, Ascorbyl Glucoside, Persea Gratissima (Avocado) Oil*, Helianthus Annuus (Sunflower) Seed Oil*, Lactobacillus, Butyrospermum Parkii (Shea) Butter*, Coco-Caprylate/Caprate, Potassium Sorbate, Eclipta Prostrata Extract, Cocos Nucifera (Coconut) Fruit Extract, Chenopodium Quinoa Seed Extract, Panax Ginseng Root Extract, Sclerotium Gum, Rubus Chamaemorus Fruit Extract, Morinda Citrifolia Fruit Extract*, Sodium Phytate, Anigozanthos Flavidus Extract*, Melia Azadirachta Leaf Extract, Terminalia Ferdinandiana Fruit Extract, Sodium Benzoate, Potassium Hydroxide, Hippophae Rhamnoides (Seabuckthorn) Fruit Oil*, Tocopherol , Moringa Oleifera Seed Oil, Alcohol.*Ingredients from Organic Farming99.7% natural origin of total. 70.0% of the total ingredients are from organic farming. 70.0% organic of total minus water and minerals.
